casebody.data:
No. 10-6019. Clayton C. Martin, Jr., Petitioner v. Gene M. Johnson, Director, Virginia Department of Corrections. 562 U.S. 1007, 131 S. Ct. 510, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 8490,

178 L. Ed. 2d 377,

November 1, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.

*378Same case below, 378 Fed. Appx. 255.
